title: 'The Batman’ Is Coming and the 2011 Movie Draft Is Here
description:
It’s baaaaack. Due to popular demand, we’ve decided to run back the movie draft. Chris Ryan rejoins Sean and Amanda to make their picks for the best of 2011. But first, we discuss the debut of some new trailers from the DC Universe, including an exciting first look at Matt Reeves's 'The Batman.'

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Chris Ryan
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
